body.description: This is the first large-scale corporate company, that I have worked with and continue to do so. Ericsson is a mammoth organisation with huge scale and every contribution makes a large impact. Here, my role largely revolves around Frontend/UX.
bullets: Responsible for leading the design, development and maintenance of the unit’s internal enterprise UI SDK; which is being used to develop user interfaces of various other products.
Worked in an agile team to deliver an enterprise Angular application with advanced use-cases for telecom operators, around the globe.
Worked in a core team to strategise & migrate all apps from old design system to Ericsson’s new design system, keeping costs at minimum & increasing agility.

body.description: Responsible to design and develop the user interface of one of the Ericsson’s enterprise software, in coordination with UX and software development teams, at BUSS R&D.

Part-Time Employment | Responsible for leading the
organisation in Software Development and Engineering, Product Design and Recruitment. Delivered 10+ client projects.
